item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/rosemary-flatbread-aip/#comment-439">analisa</a>.
So happy to hear you enjoyed the recipe! Love hearing that the flatbread worked for you.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to analisa.

So happy to hear you enjoyed the recipe! Love hearing that the flatbread worked for you.

item.title: By: analisa
item.dc:creator: analisa
item.description: Great & easy recipe! It turned out so much nicer and satisfying than I thought! Can't wait to make again. I used just under a tablespoon of rosemary and it was still super fragrant. Yum!
item.content:encoded: Great & easy recipe! It turned out so much nicer and satisfying than I thought! Can’t wait to make again. I used just under a tablespoon of rosemary and it was still super fragrant. Yum!
